nodes.text: Standoffs is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on December 16, 2004 describing the Jedi Darrus Jeht and Trilinae Untaire, and her sister Milinae in a fighting retreat against soldiers from the Navy of Thaere.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, it meant player-characters were no longer able to buy second-hand starships or droids, only brand new ones.
